title: Meiji reforms and growth of Japanese empire

content.question: The developments depicted in Map 2 most directly emerged from which of the following developments in the late nineteenth and early twentieth centuries?

choices.label: European economic imperialism in Qing China
Government-sponsored industrialization as part of the Meiji reforms
American and European influence over Tokugawa Japan
Increasing questions about political authority and growing nationalism

content.answer: Government-sponsored industrialization as part of the Meiji reforms

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
